sentences.en: Apologists for Bush point to a form of dyslexia he suffers from.
sentences.cn: 而为布什辩护的人则会说他得了一种诵读困难症.

sentences.en: Developmental dyslexia is a heterogeneous disease and the incidence rate in population is 10 %.
sentences.cn: 发育性阅读障碍是一组异质性疾病,其发病率高达10%.

sentences.en: Dyslexia can also affect person emotionally.
sentences.cn: 阅读障碍也会影响情绪.

sentences.en: Dyslexia can also affect the a person emotionally.
sentences.cn: 难语症也影响到人的情感方面.

sentences.en: Dyslexia most commonly affects reading, spelling and writing.
sentences.cn: 诵读困难通常影响阅读 、 拼写和写作.

sentences.en: Fact: Literacy is just a symptom of dyslexia it is not the condition!
sentences.cn: 事实上: 朗读困难仅仅是读写能力不健全的一种病兆.

sentences.en: He said the underlying cause of brain structure abnormalities in dyslexia is currently unknown.
sentences.cn: 他说,有阅读困难的儿童的大脑结构异常的内在原因目前仍不清楚.

sentences.en: However, we should not blame those who cannot speak well because of a physical defect such as a natural lisp, stutter or dyslexia.
sentences.cn: 不过，因身体缺陷如天生口齿不清、结巴、诵读困难等而不能讲好英语者，我们不应当责怪。

sentences.en: Protocols to train children with dyslexia are also available to fulfill their learning needs.
sentences.cn: 遥距认知康复亦提供有读写困难儿童之教育训练.

sentences.en: Some children with dyslexia might only have one of these symptoms.
sentences.cn: 有的诵读困难者可能只表现出其中的一种症状。

sentences.en: This is mainly because the child has an exceptional way of hiding the dyslexia.
sentences.cn: 这主要是因为孩子有一种独特的方式，会将诵读困难隐藏起来。

sentences.en: We talked last week a reading disorder, dyslexia, today.
sentences.cn: 我们上个星期已经讨论了说话障碍, 即诵读障碍.

sentences.en: What causes dyslexia is not clear.
sentences.cn: 怎样造成诵读困难不太清楚.
阅读困难症的成因还不清楚.

sentences.en: When the process goes awry , neurodevelopmental disorders , such as mental retardation, dyslexia, or autism may result.
sentences.cn: 如果这一过程发生错误,神经发展异常, 那么很有可能会造成智力缺陷 、 阅读障碍或者自闭症.
